author: TheDenverChannel.com Team
title: Follow 7NEWS all the time!
text:
Can we get a "happy birthday?" 
The Denver Channel's Twitter account turns 8 years old on Monday, Sept. 7. 
If you're already following us, we like your style! If not, here's a taste of what you're missing: How fast is traffic moving right now on EB I-70? The news isn't good: http://t.co/X1GSL8ujuF pic.twitter.com/JNoHupb2b1 — 7NEWS Denver Channel (@DenverChannel) September 7, 2015 Denver #LaborDay forecast: mostly beautiful with a chance of showers. Details: http://t.co/YeVNSCacCV #cowx pic.twitter.com/bQFUiGETpG — 7NEWS Denver Channel (@DenverChannel) September 6, 2015 Where do you go to #CelebrateCO ? Show us your pics! Use #CelebrateCO in your post. Pic of Royal Gorge from Thom Lancy pic.twitter.com/YZcN14f0Bc — 7NEWS Denver Channel (@DenverChannel) July 23, 2015 

We'll have you covered on breaking news, weather, the stories of Colorado, sports, and all of the content our reporters are following.
